CHAT.comment: WASHINGTON LEGAL FOUNDATION, ET AL., Petitioners v. LEGAL FOUNDATION OF WASHINGTON, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CHARLES FRIED ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID J. BURMAN ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENT LEGAL FOUNDATION OF WASHINGTON
ORAL ARGUMENT OF WALTER DELLINGER ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENTS JUSTICES OF THE SUPREME COURT OF WASHINGTON
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF CHARLES FRIED ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:03 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
